page.title: Our Services
page.subtitle: Complete digital solutions for your GCC market success
page.engagementSubtitle: Flexible collaboration to match your project needs

audit.name: Assessment & Consulting
audit.description: Comprehensive assessment of your current site and detailed development plan.

project.name: Scoped Project
project.description: Project execution with clear boundaries and defined timeline.

managed.name: Managed Services
managed.description: Ongoing support and maintenance for your digital platform.

web-dev.title: Professional Website Development
web-dev.description: Professional websites that reflect your brand and convert visitors into customers
web-dev.longDescription: We design and build integrated websites that combine beauty and functionality. Our sites are built on cutting-edge technologies to ensure exceptional user experience and superior search engine performance.

step1.title: Discovery & Planning
step1.description: Understanding your goals and target audience, planning site structure.

step2.title: UI/UX Design
step2.description: Designing attractive, modern interfaces aligned with your brand.

step3.title: Development
step3.description: Building the site with latest technologies while ensuring quality.

step4.title: Testing & Launch
step4.description: Comprehensive testing and smooth launch with training on site management.

q1.question: How long does it take to build a website?
q1.answer: Project duration depends on site size and complexity. A typical informational site takes 4-6 weeks, while advanced sites may need 8-12 weeks.

q2.question: Can I update content myself?
q2.answer: Yes, we provide an easy-to-use content management system that allows you to update content, images, and text without any technical knowledge.

q3.question: Is the site search-engine friendly?
q3.answer: Absolutely, we build the site following SEO best practices with proper structure, headings, and high loading speed.

web-apps.title: Custom Web Applications
web-apps.description: Custom web applications that optimize your business operations
web-apps.longDescription: We build advanced web applications that meet your specific business needs. From ERP and CRM systems to e-commerce platforms and admin dashboards, we leverage our expertise to build effective solutions.

step1.title: Requirements Analysis
step1.description: Studying your needs and operations to define exact requirements.

step2.title: Architecture Design
step2.description: Designing system architecture and selecting appropriate technologies.

step3.title: Development
step3.description: Building the application with quality and security in mind.

step4.title: Deployment & Training
step4.description: Deploying the application and training your team on its use.

q1.question: What's the difference between a website and web application?
q1.answer: A website is designed for display and marketing, while an application is designed for interaction and performance. Applications provide complex features like process automation and data management.

q2.question: Can the application integrate with my existing systems?
q2.answer: Yes, we build custom APIs to integrate with any existing system like ERP, CRM, or payment systems.

q3.question: How much does custom web app development cost?
q3.answer: Cost depends on complexity and requirements. We provide custom quotes after analyzing your needs.

wordpress.title: WordPress to Modern Platform Migration
wordpress.description: Transform your WordPress site into an advanced platform with superior performance
wordpress.longDescription: We migrate your existing WordPress site to a modern Next.js-based platform. Enjoy faster performance, higher security, and greater flexibility without losing content or search engine rankings.

step1.title: Current Site Analysis
step1.description: Comprehensive review of your site identifying content and technologies used.

step2.title: Planning & Migration
step2.description: Planning new platform structure and migrating content while preserving SEO.

step3.title: Building New Platform
step3.description: Developing the new site with latest technologies.

step4.title: Transfer & Testing
step4.description: Domain transfer and site activation with comprehensive testing.

q1.question: Will I lose my site content?
q1.answer: No, we migrate all content completely while preserving structure and URLs.

q2.question: What about my Google ranking?
q2.answer: We ensure SEO preservation by maintaining URLs, structures, and optimizing performance.

q3.question: How long does migration take?
q3.answer: Duration depends on site size. Typically takes 4-8 weeks for medium-sized sites.

q4.question: Can I return to WordPress later?
q4.answer: Yes, but you won't want to after experiencing the superior performance of the new platform.

hosting.title: Managed Hosting
hosting.description: Fully managed professional hosting with security and performance that never stops
hosting.longDescription: We provide managed cloud hosting with high-performance servers. Peace of mind with 99.9% uptime guarantee and 24/7 technical support.

step1.title: Needs Assessment
step1.description: Analyzing your site requirements and traffic patterns.

step3.title: Migration
step3.description: Safely transferring your site to our servers.

step4.title: Ongoing Management
step4.description: Continuous monitoring and support to ensure optimal performance.

q1.question: What's the difference between regular and managed hosting?
q1.answer: Managed hosting means we handle everything: security updates, backups, monitoring, and support. You focus on your business.

q2.question: Can I scale in my hosting?
q2.answer: Yes, our plans are flexible and adapt to your site's growth.

q3.question: How is uptime guaranteed?
q3.answer: We use redundant infrastructure and 24/7 monitoring with instant alerts for any issues.

domain.title: Domain & Email Management
domain.description: Professional domain + reliable email = complete digital presence
domain.longDescription: We provide professional domain and email services. Get a custom domain and reliable email that enhances your business credibility.

step1.title: Domain Selection
step1.description: Helping you choose the perfect domain for your business.

q1.question: Do I need my own domain?
q1.answer: Yes, a custom domain professionalizes your credibility and makes it easier for customers to find you.

q2.question: Can I use my current email?
q2.answer: Yes, but we recommend professional email with your domain name for increased credibility.

support.title: Technical Support & Maintenance
support.description: Ongoing technical support ensuring your platform always performs at its best
support.longDescription: We provide ongoing technical support and regular maintenance for your platform. Our team is ready to help you anytime and ensure your site runs smoothly.

step1.title: Status Assessment
step1.description: Reviewing your site's condition and identifying needs.

step2.title: Plan Setup
step2.description: Creating a maintenance plan that fits your needs.

step4.title: Monitoring
step4.description: Monitoring performance and responding to any issues.

q1.question: What does maintenance include?
q1.answer: Includes: security updates, backups, performance optimization, and content updates.

q2.question: Do I need ongoing support?
q2.answer: Yes, ongoing support ensures your site remains secure and performs optimally.
